Our ship is carrying an array of shell types, effective against
a variety of enemies. We change shell types for the selected

Up until now we've been firing solid cast iron shells, they're
effective enough, but let's change to explosive shells so we can
deal more damage to wooden hulls.

We need to change our strategy again for ironclads. A well
aimed broadside with armour piercing shells will do the trick!

Our direct hit has cut through that ship's hull! It's also made a
serious dent on the crew's morale. They've taken heavy casualties

and are badly shaken. If we can inflict further damage, they
may flee or surrender; either way, that would take them out of

the battle. That's the key to victory - we don't need to sink every
ship to win this engagement.
